title: Initial data set rigidity results for polyhedra
abstract:
Using spinors, we show a dihedral type rigidity for polyhedral initial data
sets. This rigidity connects spacetime positive mass theorem, dihedral rigidity
and capillary marginally trapped surfaces. Our method is to extend the rigidity
analysis of spacetime positive mass theorem due to Beig-Chrusciel to the
settings of a twisted spinor bundle.
